languages.text: {n}Богато одетый мужчина средних лет, сгорбившись, стоит перед алтарем, его ладони сложены в молитвенном жесте у самого лица. Видимые из-под имплантов участки кожи отдают неприятной синевой. Аристократ не реагирует на ваше присутствие — не поднимает головы, не моргает и даже не дышит. Только подойдя вплотную, вы понимаете, что перед вами мертвец.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Богато одетый мужчина средних лет сгорбившись стоит перед алтарем. Его голова низко опущена. Ладони с пальцами-аугментами изыскано украшены драгоценными камнями и сложены в молитвенном жесте у самого лица. Видимые из-под имплантов участки кожа иотдают неприятной синевой. Аристократ не реагирует на ваше присутствие — не поднимает головы, не моргает и даже не дышит. Подойдя ближе, вы понимаете, что перед вами мертвец.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A finely dressed man of middle years is kneeling in front of the altar, his palms folded in prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Богато одетый мужчина средних лет, сгорбившись, стоит перед алтарем, его ладони сложены в молитвенном жесте у самого лица. Видимые из-под имплантов участки кожи отдают неприятной синевой. Аристократ не реагирует на ваше присутствие — не поднимает головы, не моргает и даже не дышит. Только подойдя вплотную, вы понимаете, что перед вами мертвец.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A middle-aged man in expensive-looking clothes is hunched in front of the altar, his palms folded in a prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence — does not lift his head, does not blink and does not even breathe. Only after coming close, you realise that in front of you is a dead body.{/n}

{n}A middle-aged man in expensive-looking clothes is hunched in front of the altar, his palms folded in a prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence — does not lift his head, does not blink and does not even breathe. Only after coming close, you realise that in front of you is a dead body.{/n}

The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, does not blink and does not even breathe. Only once you come close do you realise that you are facing a dead body.{/n}

The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, does not blink and does not even breathe. Only once you come close do you realise that you are facing a dead body.{/n}

The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}

{n}A finely dressed man of middle years is kneeling in front of the altar, his palms folded in prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}

languages.text: {n}立派な身なりの中年男性が祭壇の前にひざまずき、手のひらを顔の近くで組んで祈っている。インプラントのない部分の皮膚は病的なほど青い。この貴族の男はあなたがいても何ら反応しない。顔を上げることなく、まばたきも、呼吸すらしない。あなたは男に近づいてようやく、彼が亡くなっている事に気がついた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man of middle years is kneeling in front of the altar, his palms folded in prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}立派な身なりの中年男性が祭壇の前にひざまずき、手のひらを顔の近くで組んで祈っている。インプラントのない部分の皮膚は病的なほど青い。この貴族の男はあなたがいても何ら反応しない。顔を上げることなく、まばたきも、呼吸すらしない。あなたは男に近づいてようやく、彼が亡くなっている事に気がついた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一名穿着考究的中年男子蜷缩在祭坛前，双手合十，贴近脸颊，似乎正在祈祷。他的皮肤上没有植入物的部分呈现出病态的蓝色。他对你的出现毫无反应，既没有抬头，也没有眨眼，甚至没有呼吸。只有当走近后，你才赫然发觉——他已经死了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man of middle years is kneeling in front of the altar, his palms folded in prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一名穿着考究的中年男子蜷缩在祭坛前，双手合十，贴近脸颊，似乎正在祈祷。他的皮肤上没有植入物的部分呈现出病态的蓝色。他对你的出现毫无反应，既没有抬头，也没有眨眼，甚至没有呼吸。只有当走近后，你才赫然发觉——他已经死了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un homme d'âge moyen en tenue d'apparat et à la peau d'un bleu maladif est agenouillé devant l'autel, les mains jointes près de son visage. Il ne réagit pas à votre présence ; il ne lève pas la tête, ne cille pas et n'émet pas le moindre son. Ce n'est qu'après vous être {mf|approché|approchée} que vous vous rendez compte qu'il est mort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man of middle years is kneeling in front of the altar, his palms folded in prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme d'âge moyen en tenue d'apparat et à la peau d'un bleu maladif est agenouillé devant l'autel, les mains jointes près de son visage. Il ne réagit pas à votre présence ; il ne lève pas la tête, ne cille pas et n'émet pas le moindre son. Ce n'est qu'après vous être {mf|approché|approchée} que vous vous rendez compte qu'il est mort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un hombre de mediana edad y ropa elegante se arrodilla ante el altar con las palmas de las manos juntas pegadas a su cara en señal de oración. Las partes de su piel que no tienen implantes son de un enfermizo color azul. El noble no reacciona ante tu presencia. No levanta la cabeza, no pestañea, ni siquiera respira. Al acercarte te das cuenta de que está muerto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man of middle years is kneeling in front of the altar, his palms folded in prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre de mediana edad y ropa elegante se arrodilla ante el altar con las palmas de las manos juntas pegadas a su cara en señal de oración. Las partes de su piel que no tienen implantes son de un enfermizo color azul. El noble no reacciona ante tu presencia. No levanta la cabeza, no pestañea, ni siquiera respira. Al acercarte te das cuenta de que está muerto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein gut gekleideter Mann mittleren Alters kniet vor dem Altar. Seine Hände sind dich vor seinem Gesicht zum Gebet gefaltet. Die implantatfreien Teile seiner Haut haben eine kränkliche blaue Färbung. Der Adelige reagiert nicht auf deine Anwesenheit. Er hebt weder den Kopf, noch zwinkert er. Er scheint nicht einmal zu atmen. Erst als du näher kommst erkennst du, dass er tot ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man of middle years is kneeling in front of the altar, his palms folded in prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Mann mittleren Alters in teurer Kleidung kauert vor dem Altar, die Hände vor seinem Gesicht zum Gebet gefaltet. Die implantatfreien Teile seiner Haut haben eine kränkliche blaue Farbe. Der Adlige reagiert nicht auf deine Anwesenheit. Er hebt den Kopf nicht, blinzelt nicht, atmet nicht einmal. Erst, als du näher kommst, wird dir klar, dass du eine Leiche vor dir hast.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Orta yaşlı, iyi giyimli bir adam; sunağın önünde diz çökmüş, avuçlarını yüzünün önünde birleştirmiş vaziyette dua ediyor. Vücudunun implantsız kısımları, soluk mavi bir renge bürünmüş. Soylu adam, varlığına tepki göstermiyor. Başını kaldırmıyor, gözlerini kırpmıyor, nefes dahi almıyor. Biraz daha yaklaştığında adamın ölü olduğunu anlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A finely dressed man of middle years is kneeling in front of the altar, his palms folded in prayer close to his face. The implant-free parts of his skin are a sickly blue colour. The nobleman does not react to your presence: he does not lift his head, he does not blink, he does not even breathe. Only when you draw closer do you realise that he is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Orta yaşlı, iyi giyimli bir adam sunağın önünde diz çökmüş. Adam, avuçlarını yüzünün önünde birleştirmiş; dua ediyor. Vücudunun implantsız kısımları, soluk mavi bir renge bürünmüş. Soylu adam varlığına tepki göstermiyor. Başını kaldırmıyor, gözlerini kırpmıyor, nefes dahi almıyor. Biraz daha yaklaşıyor ve ancak o zaman adamın ölü olduğunu anlıyorsun.{/n}
